mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO appoint (book_id, student_id) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{studentId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.book_id, a.student_id, a.appoint_time, b.book_id "book.bookId", b.book_name "book.bookName", b.book_number "book.bookNumber" FROM appoint a INNER JOIN book b ON a.book_id = b.book_id WHERE a.book_id = #{0} AND a.student_id = #{1}
